title: NBA Database (2000-2025)
description: NBA stats scraped from Basketball Reference covering the 1999-2000 through 2024-25 seasons.

players.description: Player biographical info: name, height, weight, position, draft details.

teams.description: Team identifiers with conference and division.

player_season_stats.description: Per-game and advanced stats for each player-season. Includes points, rebounds, assists, PER, true shooting %, win shares, BPM, VORP.

team_season_stats.description: Team record and ratings by season: wins, losses, pace, offensive/defensive rating, SRS.

games.description: Individual game results with date, teams, scores, and home/away winner.
